p: According to the broad range of properties of Boswellia species, this review described the potential effects of Boswellia species in either the treatment or prevention of the metabolic syndrome. The previous studies shed light on new ways of treatment for the metabolic syndrome by the exhibition of the effectiveness of Boswellia species in HBP, obesity, DL, and high blood glucose. Nevertheless, a series of effective clinical studies should be conducted in this regard.
